paragraphs.title: LLC "Vent-Inter Group"
descriptions: Modern engineering systems are the foundation for the successful development of our clients' businesses. Our company is a recognized expert in the field of engineering systems. This was made possible thanks to a professional and experienced team, effective project management and a quality management system.

paragraphs.title: History
descriptions: The Vent-Inter company was founded in 1990 as the first Russian-Finnish joint venture for the production of air ducts and the provision of services in the field of ventilation and air conditioning for facilities for a wide variety of purposes.
In 1996, based on personnel and production capabilities, the Vent-Inter company became a 100% Russian enterprise.
In 2005 the company was renamed Vent-Inter Engineering.
In 2009, the company's management decided to expand the range of services provided to the customer, and the company changed its name to Vent-Inter group.
Since 2022, the Vent-Inter group company has been a participant in foreign economic activity and supplies Huber & Ranner equipment.

paragraphs.title: Our Policy
descriptions: An integral part of the activities of Vent-Inter Group is:
Understanding customer needs and providing the highest quality services.

Health protection, labor safety and continuous improvement of the professional level of specialists (including certification as an expert auditor GOST R ISO 9001-2015, GOST R ISO 14001-2016, GOST R ISO 45001-2020)

paragraphs.title: Main areas of activity
descriptions: Comprehensive equipment of objects of any complexity with modern engineering systems.
Development of the concept and approval of technical specifications.
Computer-aided design, development of design and estimate documentation.
Delivery of equipment anywhere in the country.
Carrying out installation and commissioning work.
Production of air ducts and ventilation and heating equipment.
Customer services, warranty and post-warranty service.
